long_description: Sleek, aero-shaped wedge packs carry tools, food, wallets, keys, maps and anything else you need for your adventures. Unique, positive locking two-piece rail fixer securely attaches bag to seat and allows you to remove it in a snap. 3M(R) reflective trim for safety. Bag expands to accomodate extra gear. Tail-light attachment accomodates a flashing safety light, sold separately.
short_description: Sleek, aero-shaped wedge packs carry tools, food, wallets, keys, maps and anything else you need for your adventures.
